fi.tuni.work_time_tracker

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • fi.tuni.work_time_tracker.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    DatabaseHandler class handles given data of object Workhour and saves, deletes or updates rows in SQLiteDatabase.
    Since:
    0.1
